title: Round Sans Serif
content:
I spent about 3 hours trying to find this font, but failed. I need help. Thanks in advance.

Font: 

 Harabara 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190813/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

author: hkim

comments.content:
Appears to be Harabara, by André Harabara:  
 [http://www.dafont.com/harabara.font?text=PianoandStrings](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190813/http:/www.dafont.com/harabara.font?text=PianoandStrings "http://www.dafont.com/harabara.font?text=PianoandStrings")  
 [https://creativemarket.com/Harabara/28462-Harabara-Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190813/https:/creativemarket.com/Harabara/28462-Harabara-Font "https://creativemarket.com/Harabara/28462-Harabara-Font")  
 [http://harabara.carbonmade.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190813/http:/harabara.carbonmade.com/ "http://harabara.carbonmade.com/")
I think you are right. That's it!! Thank you so much!!
